works.description:
I have searched for the following excerpt "Like I mentioned earlier, there are a few methods. The first method that I'll show you is how to download all files using Firefox. There is an excellent add-on called" which I have written in my own words to find the following infringing URLs.

This is original work by me and I hold the copyright of the content. After investigating the infringing URLs, the reported URLs have copied my whole post along with images (some even hotlinked).

Kindly take appropriate action.
